availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Jett Wheeler. Father of Henry P. Wheeler, Richard M. Wheeler, Martha Ann Wheeler, Thomas J. Wheeler, Jasper Wheeler, and Elizabeth Wheeler. Married to Minerva Rice Wheeler in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on June 18, 1864. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 892B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 826.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bracken County Marriages, 1797-1898, Film #000344097, p. 294 of 403 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, 1830-1869, Film #000272799, p. 694 of 1019 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "John Wheeler (1797-1876)," Memorial #16855211, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/16855211/john-wheeler (accessed March 29, 2017).
